title: Standard Deviation Formula
text: The formula for calculating the standard deviation of a uniform distribution is $$\sqrt{\frac{{\left(b-a\right)}^2}{12}}$$, where a and $$b$$ are the $$\frac{start}{end}$$ times of our interval respectively.
